column4: My default torrent client (Deluge) has been replaced with some uncontrollable (in the sense you can't manage the torrent at all with it) Gnome client.  Must have been that Gnome update.  Can anyone help me get back to Deluge as the default?
right click a torrent file choose properties open with and choose  deluge
how can i make that the default behaviour?
when you choose open with you made it deluge....delete anything else there
the next time you double click a torrent file it will open in deluge
Does anyone know how to change the default applications selected by Gnome?  I want to change what it thinks should be the default torrent client
did you try what i told you
yes, it works but not for default behaviour
if you double click a torrent file does that open deluge
it should..are you sure you got only deluge in your open with
no, the first option is "BitTorrent" which I never installed
then click on deluge the little button should be selected for deluge
then select and delete any other programs in the list
figured it out.  Right-click on torrent file, Properties, Open With
